column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This was my second time at Jinya Ramen
column2: and I gotta say it was even better than the first time. I ordered a Jinya Tonkotsu Black with extra bamboo and fresh garlic. It was absolutely delicious!!! The consistency of the noodle was just right
column3: not too hard nor too soft. The broth was so creamy & flavorful. The only thing I didn't like about this place was how the egg came as a whole
column4: I wish they would cut it in half for me. Â
